header.noMeetingsScheduled: No meetings have been scheduled yet.
header.mobileLoginNotSupported: Login required. The login is currently not available for mobile devices. If you log in on a desktop device, you can use the add-in on mobile devices as well.

cardOptionsDropdown.deleteActionWarning1: This will delete the event from your calendar and send a cancellation mail to all participants.
cardOptionsDropdown.deleteActionWarning2: Are you sure you want to continue?

scheduledMeetingCard.legacyEventTooltip: This meeting was created with an older version of the add-in. Some functionalities like canceling the event are not possible.

officeLoginScreen.heading: Welcome to {{ appName }}
officeLoginScreen.description: Looks like you're using the app for the first time. Please log in with your Microsoft 365 account to get started!

helperLabels.noAvailabilityFor7Days: Not available for the next 7 days.
